reviewText: This is a riveting Israeli soap opera - with a young, handsome Romeo and Juliet-like couple who are in love but from different and forbidden communities - a secular Russian "Romeo" and a charedi "Juliet."  The sub-plots involving the Russian parents and other relationships hold your interest throughout.  The series is well-acted, and hearing the Hebrew language (with English subtitles throughout) is a plus.  I highly recommend "A Touch Away."

Am in the middle of watching it now. It is a gripping story.
In the past I bought DVDs directly from an Israeli distributor. Despite paying high fees for delivery, they would come in 6 weeks or more. This package I bought through Amazon, and it arrived within a week!!
